remarks.format:
## 解説 In a console application, since events are assigned to threads out of a thread pool, you might receive update progress events out of order, with a subsequent event showing a decrease compared to a previous event. You will not see such behavior in a Windows Forms application, because events in Windows Forms are processed sequentially out of the UI thread's message queue.
